info.description: This API provides access to data on the Flux platform.
info.title: Flux API

tags.name: Services
tags.description: Health check and basic service operations, such as the ping endpoint.

tags.name: Organizations
tags.description: Endpoints for organizations to configure, view, and manage their users, roles, permissions, product category specifications, commercial units, etc.

tags.name: Deals
tags.description: Endpoints for managing deals, including statuses, contracts, and related data.

tags.name: Contracts
tags.description: Endpoints for managing contracts, including statuses, roles, terms, line items, schedules, logistics, and transaction types.

tags.name: Messages
tags.description: Endpoints for managing messages, including threads, participants, and organizations.

tags.name: Streams
tags.description: Endpoints for managing streams, a commercial representation of a product.

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Endpoints for managing product categories, a representation of a product by its physical specifications.

tags.name: Measurements
tags.description: Endpoints for managing measurement units and their conversion relationships, including unit definitions, types, conversion factors, and validation rules.

tags.name: Currencies
tags.description: Endpoints for handling currencies, conversions, and related financial data.

tags.name: Pricing
tags.description: Endpoints for managing pricing, including wadfs, equalizations, fees, and related pricing data.

tags.name: Entities
tags.description: Endpoints for managing entities such as producers, carriers, marketers, and other stakeholders.

tags.name: Facilities
tags.description: Endpoints for managing facilities such as terminals, batteries, pipelines, etc.

tags.name: Volumes
tags.description: Endpoints for managing volumes, including tickets, meters, and volume transactions.

tags.name: Integrations
tags.description: Endpoints for aiding data ingestion, integrations, and data transformation pipelines between an organization's systems and Flux.

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized. The API key is missing or invalid.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden. The user does not have the necessary permissions.

InternalServerError.description: Something went wrong on the server.

BadRequest.description: The request was malformed or contained invalid parameters.

error.example: Invalid parameter format: page must be a positive integer.

get.description: Retrieve a list of facilities with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve details of a specific facility, including its name, type, subtype, status and associated entity.
Retrieve a list of facility types with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of facility types.

get.description: Retrieve a list of facility subtypes with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of facility subtypes.

get.description: Retrieve details about the current organization including associated entities, wells, and facilities.

200.description: A single organization object containing organization details along with related entities, wells, terminals, plants, batteries, stations, systems and pipelines.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all organizations with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve a list of users in the current organization with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve details about a specific user in the current organization including their roles and permissions.

200.description: A single user object containing user details along with related roles and permissions.

get.description: Retrieve a list of user roles in the current organization.
Retrieve a list of user permissions in the current organization.
List commercial facilities in the current organization with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of commercial facilities.

get.description: Retrieve details about a specific commercial facility in the current organization including their related their associated facilities.

200.description: A single commercial facility object containing facility details along with related terminals, batteries, plants, stations, etc.

get.description: Retrieve a list of entities in the current organization with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve a list of facilities in the current organization with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve a list of currencies with pagination.

post.description: Retrieve the exchange rate between two currencies and convert a value.

from_currency.description: The symbol of the currency to convert from

to_currency.description: The symbol of the currency to convert to

200.description: The converted value and exchange rate between the two currencies.

get.description: Retrieve a list of wadfs with pagination.
Retrieve details about a specific wadf.

200.description: A single wadf object containing wadf details.

get.description: Retrieve a list of wadf types with pagination.

200.description: A paginated list of wadf types.

get.description: Retrieve a list of equalizations with pagination.
Retrieve details about a specific equalization.

200.description: A single equalization object containing equalization details.

get.description: Retrieve a list of product categories with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of product categories.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific product category, including its name, specifications, and measurement units.
Retrieve a list of product category commercial bands in the current organization with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of product category commercial bands.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific product category commercial band in the current organization, including its measurement bounds and units.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product category commercial band.

200.description: Details of the product category commercial band.

404.description: Product category commercial band not found.

error.example: Product category commercial band not found.

get.description: Retrieve a list of product category mechanical bands with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of product category mechanical bands.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific product category mechanical band, including its measurement bounds and units.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product category mechanical band.

200.description: Details of the product category mechanical band.

404.description: Product category mechanical band not found.

error.example: Product Category Mechanical band not found.

get.description: Check the server health.
Retrieve a paginated list of jobs with filtering options.
Retrieve details of a specific job.
Retrieve a paginated list of requests with filtering options.
Retrieve details of a specific request.
Retrieve a list of meters.

parameters.name: regulator_id
parameters.description: Filter by regulator ID (searches across connected facilities)

get.description: Retrieve a single meter by ID.
Retrieve a list of ticket statuses with pagination options.

200.description: A paginated list of ticket codes.
